name: The Astounding Ant-Man Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which year did Lang first appear?
questions.explanation:
1979.

	Lang appeared in the 181st issue of "The Avengers" and became the second Ant-Man in the 47th issue of "Marvel Premiere".

Florida.

	Lang was born in Coral Gables, Florida. In Miami-Dade county, Coral Gables is home to the University of Miami. According to the 2000 United States census, 42,249 people lived there.

questions.text: How did Lang acquire the Ant-Man technology?
options: He made a copy of it
questions.explanation:
He stole it.

	Lang is also a reformed thief as well as an electronics expert. Lang intended to turn himself in as soon as he returned the Ant-Man suit and the canisters containing the shrinking gas, but Pym let him keep them.

questions.text: Lang has a daughter, Cassie. When she became very ill, who was the only doctor who could save her?
questions.explanation:
Dr. Sondheim

	The fictional doctor shares a last name with composer and lyricist Stephen Sondheim, who has never displayed any kind of ability with medicine at all.

questions.text: When Lang officially joined the Avengers, he clashed with which other member?
questions.explanation:
Jack of Hearts.

	Jack of Hearts can eject concussive energy from his body, and can also fly and survive in outer space unaided.

questions.text: Which heroine was Lang romantically involved with?
questions.explanation:
Jessica Jones.

	Jessica Jones has also been known as Knightress and Jewel, although she later gave up super-heroics and became a private investigator. She later married Luke Cage.

In an explosion.

	When a zombified Jack of Hearts returned to Avengers Mansion, he blew up and took half of the building with him. Lang was in the decimated half, and did not survive the explosion.

questions.text: In the MC2 Universe, which superhero group did Lang join?
questions.explanation:
A-Next.

	Both Lang, as Ant-Man, and his daughter Cassie, as Stinger, joined A-Next. In semi-retirement, Lang repaired Mainframe and realized that he still enjoyed super-heroics.

options: Via Pym particles in pill form
Via Pym particles in a liquid form
questions.explanation:
Via gaseous Pym particles.

	Lang shrank by inhaling a gaseous form of Pym particles, discovered by the first Ant-Man, Henry Pym.

questions.text: When one of their founding members went missing, Lang joined the Fantastic Four. Which member went missing?
questions.explanation:
Reed Richards.

	Lang was hired for his electronic expertise, and later became a full-fledged member of the team. While he felt outclassed by the galactic villains the Fantastic Four faced, he was in reality a strong addition to the team.
